resources.string:
some info on how to use the app 


-> when using the chat, just type:
 				@ word
 				For getting word and its meaning


				@ word full
 				For full info


				@ word attribute
 				For getting that attribute


-> when making a new word/kanji, press the "+" button to add the new attributes to it


-> you can add image to the word and kanji, it won't show up but it will be added


*note:
 				"@" is an identifier for commands, do not use it anywhere else other than commands

 				"word" and "attribute" are keywords here
